title: Bill Simmons Interview
itunes:title: Bill Simmons Interview
description:
Thurs 12/08- Sports Columnist Bill Simmons stopped by the Breakfast Club to discuss everything sports. He gives his thoughts on Colin Kaepernick and Lebron James taking political stands, beef with Isiah Thomas, and the cancellation of his talk show "Any Given Wednesday." Plus, Charlamagne gives the Hee Haw Award to some individuals who were arrested due to the Mannequin challenge.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
